content.data:
[Y]AY Music Basics
[W]Arrange three channels with intent.
[c][m.]
[W]Treat channels as roles: lead, support
[W]and pulse or bass depending on tempo.
[W]Arpeggios and envelope motion can
[W]imply richness with minimal cost.
[c][m.]
[G]- Plan channel roles.
[G]- Use repeating motifs.
[G]- Leave space for effects.
[m][m-]
[Y]MUSIC
[C]Clarity beats dense note spam.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
